package com.yulin.am;

public class InterfaveDemo {

	/**
	 * @param args
	 */
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
//Click c =new Click();    接口无法被实例化
		
		Click c = new ClickImpl();//接口的实现类
	
	}

}
class ClickImpl implements Click{

	@Override
	public void longer() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
	}

	@Override
	public int pressed() {
		return 0;
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
	}

	@Override
	public void songKai() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
	}
	
}
